AUTOMATION.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Automation Rules

Our automation rules can do all the grunt work for you except the coffee runs. This leaves more time for your team to do what they do best â€“ delivering outstanding customer service. You can use automation to add labels, assign conversations to the best agent, and perform a lot more other tasks.

You can manage your existing automation rules from this page or create new ones using the 'Add automation rule' button.

Open the Automation handbook in another tab for a helping hand.

NAME.LABEL: Rule name
NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Name your rule for internal reference.

FORM.RESET_MESSAGE: Switching the event type will reset the conditions and events you've created below.

TOGGLE.ACTIVATION_DESCRIPTION: This action will activate the automation rule '{automationName}'. Are you sure to proceed?
TOGGLE.DEACTIVATION_DESCRIPTION: This action will deactivate the automation rule '{automationName}'. Are you sure to proceed?
TOGGLE.ACTIVATION_ERROR: Could not activate automation rule. Please try again.
TOGGLE.DEACTIVATION_ERROR: Could not deactivate automation rule. Please try again.
